name: Survivalistic
description:
Survivalistic is a 2D survivor type game for PC. It`s a singleplayer game, the goal of the player like the name itself says its to survive the most time possible, where tons of enemies will try to kill you, to avoid that, you can shot proyectiles and level up to get new advantajes

controls:

w: up 

a:left

s:down

d:right

Space: shot projectile (u have to press "a" or "s" to shot that direction)
